title: 12YA: Is This A WET WAR?
body_text:
EXCLUSIVE: The Writer's Words
Sometimes things don't go as scheduled.
And let's be perfectly honest - that's the ECD story! A random, virtually unplanned dodgeball outing erupted during the very same holiday weekend in 2005. So why not in 2017?
ECD's mega
12 Year Anniversary
was really no different than it's much older brother a dozen calendars ago. A monstrous dream attraction? I guess we'll [still] have to wait. A clear blue sky? We were four years past due. The sudden event alterations perhaps made it that much more memorable for the dedicated stars that decided to take advantage of this coined "Great Adventure."
The MAIN EVENT
The absence of Kevin Adams and late arrival of his brother and returning co-captain, Chris, left legendary figure Kevin Megill in the chilly wet weather without his supporting cast. Therefore, the Hall of Fame southpaw accepted the newly-made singles clash with primary adversary, Tom Adams, as the main attraction of the 12YA.
One full wild hour of dodgeball madness quickly ensued, downpour and all - - Fitzpatrick opened each round sprinting for the first weapon available, Sputz awed his peers with his incredible catches, and the crowd cheered from the sidelines with an umbrella in one hand and camera in the other. It was truly something else.
At its conclusion, the first direct Megill-T Adams encounter earned the "Greek God" his 2nd Anniversary crown in three years.
body_html:
EXCLUSIVE: The Writer's Words
Sometimes things don't go as scheduled.

And let's be perfectly honest - that's the ECD story! A random, virtually unplanned dodgeball outing erupted during the very same holiday weekend in 2005. So why not in 2017?

ECD's mega 12 Year Anniversary was really no different than it's much older brother a dozen calendars ago. A monstrous dream attraction? I guess we'll [still] have to wait. A clear blue sky? We were four years past due. The sudden event alterations perhaps made it that much more memorable for the dedicated stars that decided to take advantage of this coined "Great Adventure."

The MAIN EVENT
The absence of Kevin Adams and late arrival of his brother and returning co-captain, Chris, left legendary figure Kevin Megill in the chilly wet weather without his supporting cast. Therefore, the Hall of Fame southpaw accepted the newly-made singles clash with primary adversary, Tom Adams, as the main attraction of the 12YA.

One full wild hour of dodgeball madness quickly ensued, downpour and all - - Fitzpatrick opened each round sprinting for the first weapon available, Sputz awed his peers with his incredible catches, and the crowd cheered from the sidelines with an umbrella in one hand and camera in the other. It was truly something else.

At its conclusion, the first direct Megill-T Adams encounter earned the "Greek God" his 2nd Anniversary crown in three years.
